Body:
app = FakeApplication()
app.controllers_router = RoutesRegistry()
get = app.controllers_router.get
class A(Controller):
    route = 'home'

    @get(first_pattern)
    async def index(self, request: Request):
        ...
@app.route(second_pattern)
async def home():
    ...
with pytest.raises(RouteDuplicate):
    app.use_controllers()
pytest.mark.asynciopytest.mark.parametrize('first_pattern,second_pattern', [('/', '/home'), (
    b'/', b'/home')])
